structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.text: As used in KRS 70.291 to 70.293, "police officer" shall have the same meaning as "police officer" in KRS 15.420 and as "officer" in KRS 16.010.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014.
